name: Cat Chess
description:
A chess AI with Mini Max implementation for a school game dev project.

Used Ray Wenderlich Chess and CCGLP GitHub Chess for references. 

(used DOTween for piece animations)

Soundtrack is Blue Bird Karaoke and the art comes from the wide array of clip art available online (including the cats, the valley, and the chess pieces!)

__________________________________________________________________________

Time to share in some of the amusing aspects of developing a chess AI... Sometimes, in order to make the game more difficult, the AI makes all the pieces the same colour (hmmm I don't think the AI likes losing...)

Also when a pawn becomes a queen sometimes the piece morphs into 3D...

My favorite piece is the bishop because it's the one who knows how to cut corners :D
